text: Friendly boss Mr Ho and team members Danny, Valerie, Peiyi etc. They have a wide collection of fine works from Singapore 1st and 2nd Generation artists. Mr Ho is sincere and trustworthy.
Not only is the founder Mr. Ho an art connoisseur as well as an amazing artist, he is also a foodie! He is great at recommending interesting art and interesting food.
Interesting stuff and really amazing artists. They bring about perspectives beyond my thinking. Really nice to look at
Nice work from Singaporean painter Wong Keen on show now.

I have been coming by this gallery for about a year now. They always have a nice selection of works on display and a broad range of art available for sale. They are really approaching art with a keen and respectful eye and looking out for the best interest of the client. Mr Ho is great and he also built a very nice team. Also want to mention that the special exhibitions they organize are world class (latest example is their Cheong Soo Pieng retrospective).
